page.title: 04Leisure Time Activities
page.content: On Sundays we usually go to the pub or somewhere in the car.When it is hot I play badminton or tennis.On Saturdays I some times go to the cinema to watch {"GHOSTBUSTERS"}or things like that.If it is a hot summers night I go for a bike ride with the family to South Dalton Pub.We have a drink or two then come back.Sometimes I go to play after school or sometimes I go to Beverley.On week days Andrew and Shane come for a bit.On the weekends we go to places like castles,The Viking Centre,museums.When we go to York and we walk around the wall.In my spare time I mostly go on the computer and write programmes or games for it.I have a Electron 32K.After school I like making things with balsa wood. Quite often the family goes swimming at Beverley Baths.
